histogram.name: ContextualTasks.Context.ContextCalculationLatency
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a query is made in the contextual tasks framework and context was calculated successfully. Records the duration it took to calculate context for the query.

histogram.name: ContextualTasks.Context.ContextDeterminationStatus
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a query is entered by the user (before being sent) in the contextual tasks framework. Records the status of context determination (success or failure reason).

histogram.name: ContextualTasks.Context.RelevantTabsCount
histogram.summary: Recorded every time a query is successfully made in the contextual tasks framework and context was calculated successfully. Records the number of tabs that were determined to be relevant to the query.
